mapper.sql: SELECT tb2.cust_id as user_id , tb1.login_id , tb1.login_id AS username , tb2.cust_nm AS user_nm , tb1.login_pw , tb1.login_pw AS password , tb1.simpl_pw , 1 AS enabled , 'YNG' AS mb_id FROM tbcs_mobile_login tb1 JOIN tbcs_customer_mobile tb2 ON tb1.cust_id = tb2.cust_id WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.select:
/* user-mapper.xml getCustomerUserList */ SELECT cust_id, cust_nm, ssn, cust_cell, mo_cd, approved_yn, data_dcd , in_emp_cd , up_emp_cd FROM tbcs_customer_mobile tb1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND tb1.cust_id = #{cust_id}
mapper.sql: SELECT tb1.login_id /* VARCHAR(100) '로그인 ID' */ , tb1.cust_id /* VARCHAR(100) '사용자 ID' */ , tb2.cust_nm , tb1.devc_id , tb1.login_pw /* VARCHAR(256) '로그인 비밀번호' */ , NVL(tb1.simpl_pw,'') simpl_pw /* VARCHAR(256) '간편 비밀번호' */ , tb1.accnt_sts /* VARCHAR(1) '계정상태' */ , tb1.expr_dt /* VARCHAR(10) '계정 만료 일자' */ FROM tbcs_mobile_login tb1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbcs_customer_mobile tb2 ON tb1.cust_id = tb2.cust_id WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert:
/* user-mapper.xml insertCustomerLoginInfo */ INSERT INTO tbcs_mobile_login ( login_id /* VARCHAR(100) '로그인 ID' */
, cust_id /* VARCHAR(100) '사용자 ID' */
, devc_id /* VARCHAR(100) '기기 ID' */
, login_pw /* VARCHAR(256) '로그인 비밀번호' */
, simpl_pw /* VARCHAR(256) '간편 비밀번호' */
, accnt_sts /* VARCHAR(1) '계정상태' */
, expr_dt /* VARCHAR(10) '계정 만료 일자' */
, in_dtm /* DATETIME '등록 일시' */ , up_dtm /* DATETIME '등록 일시' */ ) VALUES ( #{login_id} /* VARCHAR(100) '로그인 ID' */
, #{cust_id} /* VARCHAR(100) '사용자 ID' */
, #{devc_id} /* VARCHAR(100) '기기 ID' */
, #{login_pw} /* VARCHAR(256) '로그인 비밀번호' */
, #{simpl_pw} /* VARCHAR(256) '간편 비밀번호' */
, #{accnt_sts} /* VARCHAR(1) '계정상태' */
, #{expr_dt} /* VARCHAR(10) '계정 만료 일자' */
, SYSDATE /* DATETIME '등록 일시' */ , SYSDATE /* DATETIME '등록 일시' */ )
mapper.update:
/* user-mapper.xml updateCustomerLoginInfo */ UPDATE tbcs_mobile_login SET UP_DTM = SYSDATE /* DATETIME '등록 일시' */
, cust_id = #{cust_id} /* VARCHAR(100) '사용자 ID' */
, devc_id = #{devc_id} /* VARCHAR(100) '기기 ID' */
, login_pw = #{login_pw} /* VARCHAR(256) '로그인 비밀번호' */
, simpl_pw = #{simpl_pw} /* VARCHAR(256) '간편 비밀번호' */
, accnt_sts = #{accnt_sts} /* VARCHAR(1) '계정상태' */
, expr_dt = #{expr_dt} /* VARCHAR(10) '계정 만료 일자' */
WHERE login_id = #{login_id}
